sentences.english: Professor Lawrence J. Lau was installed as the sixth Vice-Chancellor of The Chinese University of Hong Kong.

sentences.english: Felix Yeung is currently a third-year student of the Music department of the Chinese University of Hong Kong .

sentences.english: Tony received a Bachelor of Business Administration from Chinese University of Hong Kong.

sentences.english: This course is conducted by Enrichment Programme for Young Mathematics Talents, Department of Mathematics, The Chinese University of Hong Kong.

sentences.english: I'm a final year student at the Chinese University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 我现正在香港中文大学修读最后一年的课程。

sentences.english: Jack Linchuan Qiu is associate professor at the School of Journalism and Communication, the Chinese University of Hong Kong.

sentences.english: Since 2002, he has been Distinguished Professor-at-large of The Chinese University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 从2002年起，他任香港中文大学博文讲座教授。

sentences.english: VI. Are you currently a full-time post-graduate student of CUHK?
